sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"翻译，译文"之意。
means: translation ： 普通用词，指从一种语言到另一种语言的翻译。
version可与translation换用，尤指不拘泥于文字的意译，更常指某种作品的一种译文。
paraphrase ： 可指非常自由的解释，不拘泥遣词造句，重在传意。通常指用同样语言深入浅出地解释艰深的句子或段落。

word_mean: 转译，翻译：遗传学上指多肽链的合成过程，氨酸顺序完全是由信使RNA(mRNA)中碱基顺序决定的，后者又决定于它所转录的基因DNA中碱基顺序
由信使核糖核酸携带的遗传信息指导蛋白质合成的过程。
mRNA在核糖体上合成多肽的过程。

sentence.Network_en: A literal translation of the name Tapies is "walls."
sentence.Network_cn: Tapies这个名字直译过来是“墙”。

sentence.Network_en: The papers have been sent to Saudi Arabia for translation.
sentence.Network_cn: 文件被送到沙特阿拉伯进行翻译。

sentence.Network_en: When a book goes into translation, all those linguistic subtleties get lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一部书被翻译成另一种语言后，所有那些语言上的精妙之处就都丢失了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin translatio(n-), from translat- 'carried across' (see translate)

entry.def: A translation is a piece of writing or speech that has been translated from a different language.

example.tran: 麦克尼斯精彩的《浮士德》英文译本

example.ex: I've only read Solzhenitsyn in translation.
example.tran: 索尔仁尼琴的作品我只读过译本。

entry.tran: 翻译中意义受损(或流失)
entry.def: If you say that a quality of something has been lost in translation, you mean that it is not very good as a result of being translated into another language or told in a different way.

example.ex: Much of the wit is lost in translation…
example.tran: 很多诙谐的成分都在翻译中丢失了。

example.ex: French filmmakers say American remakes are losing something in the translation.
example.tran: 法国电影人说美国翻拍的版本丧失了原作的部分精髓。

means.word_mean: 1. a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
3. the act of changing in form or shape or appearance;

sentences.sentence: "a photograph is a translation of a scene onto a two-dimensional surface"

means.word_mean: 4. (mathematics) a transformation in which the origin of the coordinate system is moved to another position but the direction of each axis remains the same
5. (genetics) the process whereby genetic information coded in messenger RNA directs the formation of a specific protein at a ribosome in the cytoplasm
6. rewording something in less technical terminology

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

Sentence.sentence: It is used in personal context, on radio broadcasts and in a number of publications as well as in translations of both modern works and classics.

sentences.en: Lanny got a French translation of the seven plays.
sentences.cn: 兰尼有这七个戏剧的法文译本。

jushi.english: Lanny got a French translation of the seven plays.
jushi.chinese: 兰莉有这七个戏剧的法文译本。

jushi.english: The translation of poetry is difficult.
I've only read Tolstoy in translation.
jushi.chinese: 我只读过托尔斯泰小说的翻译本。
